mapper.insert: INSERT INTO challenge_activity (chal_act_id, chal_id, regdate, img) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(chal_act_id)+1,0) FROM challenge_activity), #{item.chalId}, TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{item.img})
mapper.select: SELECT a.chal_act_id, a.chal_id, a.regdate, a.img FROM challenge_activity a JOIN challenge c ON c.chal_id = a.chal_id WHERE mem_id = #{memId}
